message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet the highest standards of quality and performance. This exceptional item is worth more than $12000 to me, but I'm willing to consider your offer. Let's make this deal work for both of us. My initial offer for the product is $15000.

Hello Alice, thank you for considering my offer. I appreciate the quality and performance of your product. However, given my budget constraints, I am unable to match the price of $15000. Would you be willing to lower the price to $12000? I believe we can find a mutually beneficial solution.
